title: Gardener
description: I watch him.  I want him, but I’m too shy to tell him.Tyler Finlay is a freelance film critic spending most of his time working at home, alone and bored. He often watches and daydreams about his gardener Jacob.Jacob has worked for Tyler for a few months, unaware that Tyler watches him from the bedroom window while he works. Jacob is oblivious to how his boss feels about him.Tyler, the voyeur, often satisfies himself as he watches Jacob's hot body sweating in the sun. But he keeps his desires a secret unsure of how Jacob would react to his true feelings. Then one hot sunny day, a breeze blows the curtain, letting Jacob glimpse Tyler naked as he watches him through the window.Will Tyler get what he has dreamed of so many times from the gardener?
author: B.J. Smyth
